articles.title: These Mass. schools are closed on Tuesday, Feb. 24.
articles.description:
See an updating list of announced school closures for Feb. 24.

The post These Mass. schools are closed on Tuesday, Feb. 24. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts schools, including Boston, will be closed on Tuesday, Feb. 24.
Over 50 schools statewide announced closures due to severe weather conditions.
Parents should prepare for childcare needs as students will not attend classes.

articles.title: AJ Brown recalls ‘critical’ Mike Vrabel moments that changed hatred to respect
articles.description:
Brown used to write "I hate [Vrabel]" in a notebook during team meetings. Things are different now, he says.

The post AJ Brown recalls ‘critical’ Mike Vrabel moments that changed hatred to respect appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: AJ Brown initially disliked coach Mike Vrabel, noting this in team meetings.
Brown's perspective shifted after critical moments with Vrabel during their time together.
This change in attitude may influence team dynamics for the New England Patriots.
